# root

**Instance Property**

The first node in a tree of animations.

## Declaration

```swift
var root: any BlendTreeNode { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property defines the node that represents the root of a blend tree. If you assign this property a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode] instance, the root branches for every member you add to the instance’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode/sources] property.

If you define a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeSourceNode] instance to this property, the tree contains a single animation, which blends with no other animations.

## Configuring the animation

- **name**: A textual name for the animation.
- **bindTarget**: A textual name that identifies the particular property that animates.
- **blendLayer**: The order in which the framework composites the animation.
- **isAdditive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation builds on the current state of the target entity or resets the state before running.
